ygData.subject: Re: shoulder slots
ygData.msgSnippet: You could always try and get to the Priest room in Sol B and get one of the no drop Carnel Pauldrons, Ac9 +7 Dex +15 mana, not bad at all. This is what I
ygData.messageBody:
You could always try and get to the Priest room in Sol B and get one of the
no drop Carnel Pauldrons, Ac9 +7 Dex +15 mana, not bad at all.
This is what I replaced my BS Mantle for.

Madagan Songweaver




"MICHELLE M BODIE" <LEIAORGANA@...> on 28/01/2000 09:59:56

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] shoulder slots




From: "MICHELLE M BODIE" <LEIAORGANA@...>

Which do you think would be better for my lvl 19 bard? Bloodstained mantle
or crested spaulders. The spaulder give more ac, but the mantle gives str
and sv magic.
